website_summaries.verdict: A tweaked keyboard and the option for a 10th Generation Intel "Ice Lake" CPU bring typing comfort and better performance to Apple's already-excellent 13-inch MacBook Pro.

customer_reviews.title: Latest 2019 model
customer_reviews.text: First time on a Mac. Will never go back to windows again:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sublime Laptop
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic computer. The display is crystal clear and sharp, the keyboard is wonderful to type on and the Touch Bar is very useful (Touch ID particularly so). This is a significant upgrade from my old 2013 MacBook Air.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: If you’ve never used a MacBook before then you’ll probably think they are over priced and not worth it. If you have used one then you’ll probably never want to use a windows laptop ever again! Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this MacBook for the past month and am really happy with the performance. It has a really high screen quality, with bright vivid colours. The OLED strip makes it easy to switch between the multiple open windows, and makes formatting fonts easily during word processing (eg highlighting and changing font colour). Sound is also great!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Galea

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Arrived and Did Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Very poor experience all around. Bought this computer on Sunday and it was delivered promptly. But when I tried to set it up, keyboard not functioning. Called Apple Support - they could not fix it and suggested I return to Amazon for a replacement. Apple had no interest in sorting out my problem themselves. But Amazon have no more stock and can only offer a refund - refund takes two weeks, so now I have no computer and no money for 14 days either. When I am spending this much, I would expect a replacement to be sent to me...be warned.
customer_reviews.author: chrisinstanley

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product you can watch the battery go down & only doing light browsing. This isn't a pro at all if you install google chrome the battery goes down faster 1% every 2 half minutes. This isn't worth the money terrible....
customer_reviews.author: AnonHQ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product of an amazing quality as always by APPLE. My only complain is the lack of 16gb RAM option. In any case MacBook Pro 13 is a solid laptop for everyday use and I'm more than happy with my choice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Screen is buggy
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with the screen of the MacBook Pro, it bugs from time to time. What should I do?
customer_reviews.author: Aytac Eren

customer_reviews.title: Great product from Apple...
customer_reviews.text: Say no more about Apple... great product, daughter is well happy with it.😀😀
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a Mac and finally due to a 5 month payment dared to invest in it. Love the operating system. The keys are a bit okay, but the rest of the system is beautiful. The screen quality is crisp. One thing to note, the battery claim is 10 hours, but it is normally around 5-5.5 hours The delivery was super fast. Although heard of problematic deliveries from Amazon, so was a bit skeptical before opening the box and hence made a video while opening but God forbid, everything was good :) All in all I’m happy with my Mac and the delivery
customer_reviews.author: Rishi Gogia

product_meta.title: Apple MacBook Pro (13-inch, 8GB RAM, 256GB Storage) - Silver (Previous Model)
feature_bullets: Brilliant Retina display with true Tone technology
Up to 10 hours of battery life
